full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

**Title (English)**: EW038-240136 CSC EMSI Structured Intervention Unit Upgrades
**Title (French)**: EW038-240136 SSC EESM Travaux d’amélioration de l’Unité d’intervention structurée

## Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: WS4035836796
- **Amendment Number**: 5
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4035836796
- **Public Publication Date**: June 1, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: July 11, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
- **Scope of Work**: Renovation of the Structured Intervention Unit at the Edmonton Maximum Security Institution
- **Upgrades**: Plumbing, mechanical, electrical, and architectural work throughout the unit, including upgrades to the Unit 6 area
- **Optional Site Visit**: June 20, 2023, 10:00 AM Mountain Daylight Time (MDT), at Meridian Street NE, Edmonton, AB T5Y 6E7

## Procurement Information
- **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
- **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré
- **unspsc**: 72120000
- **unspscDescription (English)**: Nonresidential building construction services
- **procurementCategory**: CNST
- **noticeType (English)**: Request for Proposal
- **procurementMethod (English)**: Competitive – Open bidding
- **selectionCriteria (English)**: Lowest Price

## Contact Information
- **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**:
  - **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
  - **Contact**: Virakorn, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC) – matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Correctional Services Canada (CSC), is seeking tenders for the renovations of the Structured Intervention Unit at the Edmonton Maximum Security Institution. The scope of work for this project includes a number of upgrades to the Unit 6 area at the Edmonton Institution, which includes plumbing, mechanical, electrical, and architectural work throughout the unit.
